meanings.definition: A person who dies without a will.
meanings.sent1: Many intestates leave their loved ones unsure of how to distribute their belongings.
meanings.sent2: The lawyer explained the legal process for handling the estate of intestates.
meanings.sent3: At the family gathering, they joked about who among them would end up intestates.
meanings.sent4: The room full of unclaimed items felt like a gathering of intestates waiting to be chosen.
meanings.sent5: In the absence of a will, intestates can cause confusion and disputes among family members.
